alert.note: Alert for Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 1:06PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New Castle and northwestern Salem Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 105 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mount Pleasant, or near Middletown, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Newark, Middletown, Pennsville, Carneys Point, New Castle, Delaware City, Newport, Saint Georges, Mount Pleasant, Stanton, Glasgow, Bear, Delaware Memorial Bridge, Port Penn, Wilmington Manor, Pike Creek, North Star, Odessa and Brookside. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 1 and 12. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
